TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ExecutedRoutedEventHandler(object sender, ExecutedRoutedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed ExecutedRoutedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ExecutedRoutedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As ExecutedRoutedEventArgs)
public delegate void ExecutedRoutedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, ExecutedRoutedEventArgs ^ e);
type ExecutedRoutedEventHandler = delegate of obj * ExecutedRoutedEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: 事件处理程序所附加到的对象。

span.span: The object where the event handler is attached.

summary.span: 表示将处理 和 路由事件以及相关附加事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the and routed events, as well as related attached events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此委托包含实现逻辑。This delegate contains the implementation logic for a . 将与命令分离的实现逻辑允许从不同的源和类型，调用的命令，并启用集中命令逻辑。Separating the implementation logic from the command allows the command to be invoked from different sources and types, and enables the centralization of command logic. 此委托还可用于并，这是在附加事件实现很多命令基础结构的类。This delegate is also used for and , which are attached events on the class that implements much of the commanding infrastructure. 但大多数实际的处理程序将处理来自特定事件，而不是不是在工作级别。But most practical handlers will handle the events from a particular , rather than work at the level. 在，以下属性一般是相关的编写执行的命令而得出的路由事件的事件处理程序时：Within , the following properties are generally of interest when you write an event handler for a routed event that results from an executed command: - 报告已执行此命令的目标。 reports the target where the command was executed. 一旦执行该命令，你也可以将的详细信息通常在路由事件术语中，为引发路由的事件的对象。Once the command is executed, you can also think of the more generally in routed event terms, as the object that raised a routed event. - 报告执行的命令。 reports the command that executed. 如果你使用命令绑定，并编写处理程序可能处理多个命令，此属性很有用。This property is useful if you use command bindings and if you write handlers that potentially handle multiple commands. - 报告已由正在执行的命令传递任何特定于命令的参数。 reports any command-specific parameters that were passed by the executing command. 并非所有命令都使用或需要特定于命令的参数。Not all commands use or expect command-specific parameters. - 报告是否源自执行的命令的路由的事件已处理的路由的不同元素。 reports whether the routed event that resulted from the executed command was already handled by a different element along the route. 对于路由的事件处理程序，它是推荐的做法具有处理设置事件时执行有意义的工作的处理程序到`true`。For routed event handlers, it is a recommended practice to have handlers that do meaningful work when handling the event to set to `true`. 这可以防止事件再次沿路由的处理典型的事件处理程序。This prevents typical handlers for the event from handling the event again further along the route. 处理路由的事件的详细信息，请参阅[路由事件标记为已处理，和类处理](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/marking-routed-events-as-handled-and-class-handling.md)。For more information on handling routed events, see [Marking Routed Events as Handled, and Class Handling](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/marking-routed-events-as-handled-and-class-handling.md). 此委托还表示用于处理程序并，这是在附加事件实现很多命令基础结构的类。This delegate also represents handlers for and , which are attached events on the class that implements much of the commanding infrastructure. 但大多数实际的处理程序将处理来自特定事件，而不是不是在工作级别。But most practical handlers will handle the events from a particular , rather than work at the level. 有关命令的详细信息，请参阅[命令概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md)。For more information on commanding, see [Commanding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md). ## Examples 此示例将创建时执行此命令在目标系统上设置可视化属性。This example creates an that sets a visual property on the target when the command is executed. 该示例还包括相同命令。The example also includes the for the same command. [!code-csharp[Custom_RoutedCommand#Custom_RoutedCommandHandlers](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Custom_RoutedCommand/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#custom_routedcommandhandlers)] [!code-vb[Custom_RoutedCommand#Custom_RoutedCommandHandlers](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Custom_RoutedCommand/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#custom_routedcommandhandlers)]
